name: GeoNetwork Marvlis AODN
description: A data catalog hosting oceanographic and marine metadata records, primarily focused on the Australian region.
owner_name: Integrated Marine Observing System (IMOS) / Australian Ocean Data Network (AODN)
owner_subregion_iso3166_2: AU-ACT (as AODN is nationally coordinated, not regional)
owner_subregion_name: Australian Capital Territory (main coordination and office location)
